Package fit.gja.songtrainer.controller

Class SongtrainerController

java.lang.Object
fit.gja.songtrainer.controller.SongtrainerController
@Controller public class SongtrainerController extends Object
Controller class responsible for request mappings coming from the home page.

      Parameters:
      theLectorId - User id of lector
